name: @svelte-gear/svelte-semantic-ui
description: svelte bindings for semantic-ui or fomantic-ui
author: AK
_files: files to be included when the library is installed as a dependency

export root folder; other exports must start with './' as well

scripts.package: export NODE_ENV=production && yarn build && echo Packaging... && svelte-kit sync && svelte-package && publint && ./pre-publish.sh

_peerDependencies.svelte: see app.html and /routes folder for examples; the library can be used without svelte-kit
_peerDependencies.jquery: jQuery must be statically loaded in DOM for semantic ui to work
_peerDependencies.fomantic-ui-css: works with semantic-ui or fomantic-ui, packages may be imported or loaded in DOM
_peerDependencies.semantic-ui-css: for semantic-ui, add optional fomantic modules: calendar, slider, toast, and form

_dependencies._none: the library has no npm dependencies, but jQuery and semantic-ui must be present at runtime
_dependencies.jquery: 3.7.1 - needs to be imported in app.html

_devDependencies.eslint-config-prettier: 9.1.0 - is not used; we prefer modifying eslint rules to match prettier
_devDependencies.npm-run-all: 4.1.5 - allows to run npm tasks sequentially or in parallel; not yet required
_devDependencies.eslint: 9.5.0 - v9 requires config file changes, not compatible with airbnb rules (8.53 has many changes)
_devDependencies.typescript: 5.7.2 - not yet supported by eslint and typedoc
